description: With its light prickle on the tongue, this is as fresh as possible. It's clean, packed with green and citrus fruits, and boosted with some textured richness. Drink at once.
title: Solar de Pinheiro 2012 Paço de São Lourenço White (Vinho Verde)

description: In a medium sweet style, the wine has a light prickle and fine citrus acidity to balance the soft freshness. It is a refreshing wine, totally drinkable immediately.
title: Messias 2015 Santola White (Vinho Verde)

description: A rose pink colored wine that is dry and with ripe fruit. Its acidity contrasts with the warm red-berry fruit and the edge of tannin. There is a peppery, crisp aftertaste.
title: Quinta de Paços 2015 Casa de Paços Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A fresh lemon-flavored wine with crisp acidity balanced by warmer white-stone fruit. It is fruity, showing a touch of toast and almonds. Drink now.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Bruto Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: This is crisp and fresh medium-sweet wine. It is bright with red-currant acidity and ripe with a strawberry and cream flavor. The wine is clean, lively and, of course, ready to drink.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Rosé Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: A just off-dry Vinho Verde, fresh and spritzy. Acidity, sweet apples and a breezy citrus edge combine easily and lightly. Ready to drink.
title: Aveleda 2010 Praia White (Vinho Verde)

description: This blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura is initially crisp and fresh. Gradually, it broadens out into a rich wine with a blend between lemon and yellow fruits that is delicious and concentrated. This tangy wine is developing well, and is ready to drink now although it will age.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 Torre de Menagem Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a soft wine with its creamy fruits assimilated into the tangy texture. There is plenty of acidity to give this wine its cool character as well as its citrus and green-apple flavors. Drink now.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2016 Arca Nova Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: A fine, crisp wine, with delicious green apple flavors and a tang of lime, a touch of yeast, and a dry, fresh aftertaste. There's a delicious bite to this fragrant wine.
title: Quinta de Serrade 2006 Solar de Serrade Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp. dry and fruity, this wine has a light touch of citrus and fresh acidity. Fruity with a slight sparkle, it's an ideal apéritif.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Azul Portugal Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is the lightest in a series of wines featuring the Avesso grape. Herbal, crisp and with plenty of acidity, it's also fruity and ready to drink.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Avesso & Azal White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fresh and fragrant rosé from the Vinho Verde region. It has light acidity and a red fruit flavor. The lightest prickle gives just that extra lift.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2011 Espadeiro Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a lively, off-dry wine with intense acidity to accompany its crisp apple and citrus flavors. Very fruity, it's ready to drink now. Screwcap.
title: Quinta do Portal 2011 Trevo White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light and bright, this has a crisp prickle on the tongue, along with canned grapefruit and tight apple-skin flavors. It is almost dry, which gives the wine a mineral texture that adds a bite. Drink now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2013 QM Blue White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is an attractive, light prickle on the tongue of this fresh, crisp and fruity wine. It is dry, tensely tangy with a green, zesty character. Drink now.
title: Wine with Spirit 2014 Seafood & Co White (Vinho Verde)

description: This light, bright wine comes from the north of the Vinho Verde region. It has freshly squeezed lemon juice with a touch of lime zest as well as spice. The lightest prickle on the tongue gives the wine a final lift.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: Aromas of strawberry sherbet are followed by sweet candy-shop flavors on the palate. Chill it thoroughly before drinking. Screwcap.
title: Viniverde 2011 Estreia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A soft Vinho Verde, with white fruit flavors, only light acidity and some final sweetness. An attractive apéritif.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2010 Clemens Reserva White (Vinho Verde)

description: On the dry side, with caramel and strawberry flavors, this is an attractive, bright rosé, as fresh as they come.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2010 Escolha Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Named for the 14th-century English princess who married the Portuguese king, this is a soft and rounded style of Vinho Verde. It has yellow fruits, melon and pear flavors and a full texture. Drink this food-friendly wine now.
title: Casa de Vila Nova 2013 Filipa de Lencastre White (Vinho Verde)

description: This crisply fruity wine is primarily composed of the local Loureiro grape. It is light, bright, dry and full of citrus flavors. Drink now.
title: Vicente Faria Vinhos 2016 Animus Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is a light prickle to this freshly crisp and dry rosé. It bursts with raspberry and red currant flavors, tangy acidity and a lively finish.
title: Adega de Monção 2011 Muralhas de Monção Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: From the Vinho Verde subregion of Monção and Melgaço, this intense, bone-dry wine captures the richness of Alvarinho while not losing sight of its fresh lemon and crisp apple side. It has a tight texture that suggests the wine is still young, so drink from late 2016.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2014 Muros Antigos Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This delicious blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura comes from the northern part of the Vinho Verde region. The flavors are ripe yet crisp, with notes of apple and pink grapefruit. The acidity is prominent, yet well integrated into the rich fruitiness. Drink now.
title: Provam 2014 Varanda do Conde White (Vinho Verde)

description: Ripe Alvarinho gives a wine that is rich as well as crisp and dry. This wine, with its hints of apricot as well as citrus fruits has a piercing line of acidity along with the tangy texture and ripe aftertaste. It is ready to drink.
title: Aveleda 2015 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Vineyards just across the hills from the Douro have produced this ripe wine. It has fine acidity that gives freshness to the apple, peach and ripe pear fruits. The aftertaste is bright, tight with minerality and citrus. Drink now.
title: Casa do Valle 2015 Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of the two major grapes of the region, Alvarinho and Loureiro, and grown at the home estate of the producer, this is delicious Vinho Verde. It is dry, crisp, light and piercingly bright, perfect either as an apéritif or with seafood. Drink now.
title: Aveleda 2016 Quinta da Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is an off-dry and lightly structured wine that has a crisp, mineral texture. It is bright, with citrus and apple notes that are cut by tangy lemon peel. The finish is tight and direct; drink now.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2014 Pluma White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, fruity and off dry, this is a fresh and crisp wine. It has sweetened lemon juice flavors that are cut by intense, young acidity. Balanced and ready to drink now.
designation: Salsus Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Salsus Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas White (Vinho Verde)

description: This blend is dominated by one of the two grapes of Vinho Verde: the Loureiro. That gives both a crisp texture and ripe apple and green-plum fruits. It is a ripe wine, juicy and ready to drink now.
title: Quinta de Paços 2016 White (Vinho Verde)

description: With a light prickle on the tongue, this is a fresh and fruity wine that has sweetness balanced by a citric edge. It's crisp and ready to drink.
title: Campelo 2014 Casal da Seara White (Vinho Verde)

description: A sweet rosé that is light and fresh from the crisp raspberry acidity. It is bright and fruity, ready to drink.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 Lagar Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: From the far north of the Vinho Verde region, the rich and creamy wine balances acidity, green plum and crisp minerality. Aromatic, elegant, fresh.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2009 Touquinheiras White (Vinho Verde)

description: A light spritz gives this wine some of the character of club soda and lime, with a slight brinyness to add interest.
title: Quinta da Aveleda NV Casal Garcia White (Vinho Verde)

description: A sweet Vinho Verde, it is light, fruity and perfect for the summer. With crisp acidity, a lively, frothy texture and a clean apple aftertaste, it can be drunk now.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2013 Arca Nova White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine has all the freshness of the grape, along with ripe, full lemon and red apple flavors. There is a strongly tangy character, a mineral texture from the granite soil and refreshing final acidity. Drink from summer 2016.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2014 Muros de Melgaço Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: For a Vinho Verde, this is smooth. With the a creamy texture along with bread fruit and lime flavors, the wine is soft. There is acidity to give a lift perfectly judged to keep this attractively crisp at the end. Drink now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: In praise in the Loureiro grape, this dry wine has lively acidity while also having a ripe full texture of apples and pink grapefruit. The wine is crisp and intensely fruity. Drink now and until early 2018.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Maria Bonita Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Alvarinho from the northern Vinho Verde region lends itself to bubbles with its naturally crisp character. It gives a wine that has a tight mineral texture that lifts the citrus and green-apple fruits. The wine, packed with acidity, is ready to drink.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Reserva Bruto Natural Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp and green, this has a ripe, rounded apple flavor that lends the wine richness. There is a yeasty character to go with the fruitiness, while the refreshing acidity lasts through the finish.
title: Vera 2011 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A Vinho Verde with some weight from the ripe pear and grapefruit-flavored fruit. It is bone dry, very fresh, the intensity of flavors turning this into a fine food wine.A Vinho Verde with some weight from the ripe pear and grapefruit-flavored fruit. It is bone dry, very fresh, the intensity of flavors turning this into a fine food wine.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Lima 2009 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp, not quite dry, this incorporates lively, fruity Loureiro grapes with a touch of Trajadura and Arinto culled from Lima Valley vineyards. With its light squeeze of lemon and sliced apple and grapefruit flavors, it's all about freshness. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Lima 2013 Ponte White (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced from the vines that surround the family house at Quinta da Aveleda, this is an exemplary Vinho Verde. Dry and crisp, with richness as well as freshness, it is a bright, tight and lightly mineral wine to drink now.
title: Aveleda 2014 Quinta da Aveleda Estate Bottled White (Vinho Verde)

description: From old vines trained on high trellises, this fruity wine is bright with citrusy acidity and lemon zest-like texture. Its creamier side emerges as the wine develops in the glass. Best to wait until 2018.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Nostalgia Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A fairly full, rich and creamy version of Vinho Verde, with floral and anise aromas. Big and yet refreshing, sparked by some lively spritz. The finish echoes the anise and blends in some bright lime notes as well.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 1998 Couto de Frades Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is called sweet and that's what it is. The candied sweetness is balanced by some acidity to keep the wine crisp and fruity. It will be fine as an apéritif. Drink now.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Sweet White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine, one in a series featuring the Avesso grape, is a blend of two of the major Vinho Verde grapes. Avesso comes from the south of Vinho Verde; Loureiro is from the central section. The wine is ripe, rounded and full of apple, pear and green-plum fruits. The aftertaste is crisp and tangy.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Avesso & Loureiro White (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly sweet, this is a soft, gently fruity wine with a prickle on the tongue and fruit-drop acidity. Screwcap.
title: Aveleda 2012 Casal Garcia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: The merest prickle on the tongue adds to the freshness of this crisp, clean, lightly sweet wine. Very fruity, it conveys apples and citrus, with a soft, fragrant aftertaste.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Salsus White (Vinho Verde)

description: Simaens has produced a ripe style of wine here. Apple and rich citrus flavors add a delicious touch to tropical fruit flavors. This wine is fit for drinking in the next few months.
title: Borges 2011 Quinta de Simaens White (Vinho Verde)

description: A bright, citrusy, crisp, off-dry Vinho Verde. It is the perfect aperitif wine with its light texture, slight fizz and a delicious lemon and grapefruit aftertaste.
title: Vinhos Norte 2010 Cruzeiro Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: The name is not a Portuguese greeting, but a blending of Alvarinho and Loureiro, the grapes in the wine. It is a rich, juicy wine full of apricot, apple and pear flavors. It has just the right amount of tangy texture and refreshing acidity. The wine is fruity, perfumed and bright.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2015 Allo White (Vinho Verde)

description: The producer is based in the Monção and Melgaço region of northern Vinho Verde. It is crisp—so fresh and cut with apple and citrus acidity. Light and poised, it has just the lightest touch of wood from the short oak aging. Drink now.
title: Provam 2015 Portal do Fidalgo Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Attractive lemon-flavored citrus character with light acidity. This is a classic, creamy wine with a fresh aftertaste. A drink now wine. Screw cap.
title: Casca Wines 2009 Cape Roca Fish White (Vinho Verde)

description: The Loureiro is the grape of the Lima Valley subregion in Vinho Verde. The texture of the wine is rounded and creamy, although the crisp green fruits give a great bright lift to this delicious, fresh wine.
title: Quinta do Ameal 2009 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Predominantly Loureiro, this is rich, ripe wine. It has a sunny character, ripe with green plums and apples and lightly shot with acidity. It is aromatic, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2015 Calçada Terroir Loureiro-Alvarinho White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wood-aged Vinho Verde is a world away from the light and sweetened wines. It is rich, almost Chardonnay-like in its smooth, creamy character. At the same time, it still shows its origin in its tight acidity and a crisp aftertaste. Drink now, or better in a year.
title: Casa do Valle 2013 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: One of the classic brands of Vinho Verde, this is still one of the best. It has great fruitiness and crisp acidity, only just off dry. Lemon sherbet and fresh orange zest give a delicious lift to the finish.
title: Aveleda 2014 Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: From the northern Vinho Verde region of Melgaço which is the natural heartland of Alvarinho, this tangy, fruity wine bursts with acidity and creamed apple flavors. It is still young, a lively and fruity wine that will benefit from some calming down and broadening out. Drink from the end of 2015.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Toucas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Apples and strawberry combine easily in this soft, fresh rosé. It's fruity, light, with a slight prickle in the mouth.
title: Aveleda 2010 Casal Garcia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This 100% Alvarinho comes from the grape's heartland in the north of the Vinho Verde region. It is crisp while also having concentrated green and citrus fruits, a rich mineral texture and layers of beautifully refreshing acidity. Drink this wine from 2018.
title: Santos & Seixo 2016 Santos da Casa Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Named after the 13th-century house at the center of the estate, this is a rich, full-bodied wine. With citrus flavors at its heart, it also shows a texture that gives minerality from the granite soil, followed by juicy yellow fruits and finishing with intense acidity. Give this wine until mid-2015 to settle down.
title: Quinta de Paços 2013 Casa do Capitão-mor Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This light, bright and very fruity wine almost dances on the palate. Peach and apple skin flavors bring out a crisp, green acidity. A touch of minerality and texture give the wine character. Drink now.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2012 Aphros Ten Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Alvarinho with a prickle is unusual, as is a Vinho Verde that has been aged an extra year before release. The wine doesn't quite work because it has lost its fruit and developed a strong pepper and spice character. The acidity at the end is the most characteristic part of the wine.
title: Conde Villar 2014 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Fresh, crisp and fruity, this is a citrus and apple-flavored medium-dry wine. With plenty of acidity, bright and packed with easy fruitiness, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is made from the most widely planted red grape in Vinho Verde, Vinhão. It is soft and juicy with a ripe character and almond and caramel flavors. Drink now.
title: Quinta de Paços 2016 Casa de Paços Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp apples, touched with some sweetness, but finely clean and fresh, this is a great apéritif style of Vinho Verde, finishing with just a sparkle. Screwcap.
title: José Maria da Fonseca 2006 Twin Vines White (Vinho Verde)

description: The Aveleda estate is the source of the fruit for this dry, delicious Vinho Verde. It's a reference for the food-friendly, lemon and grapefruit style, adding minerality and a taut texture to the forward fruitiness. Drink this summer, or hold for up to six months.
title: Aveleda 2012 Quinta da Aveleda Estate Bottled White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is all about fruit. It is dry and so fresh and crisp with apple and green pear flavors. There is a light prickle there that adds a dancing lightness to this refreshing wine.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fruity wine with a off-dry character that is balanced by lime and lemon fruitiness. The acidity and the tangy herbal character give the wine an attractive bite. Drink now.
title: Caves Velhas NV Lagosta White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is attractive with its ripe apple flavors and shot of lemon. It is off dry, with a fruity character that makes it a great apéritif wine. Drink now.
title: Enoport 2016 Vinhas Altas White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is a crisp spring in this wine— light and bright with great acidity and a touch of sweetness. It has a light prickle on the tongue that adds to the liveliness of this attractive wine.
title: Casca Wines 2016 Bote Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is classic, off-dry Vinho Verde. With its light prickle, crisp fruit that has a tangy lime and lemon character that comes through the candy flavor, it is a refreshing, light wine.
title: Aveleda 2015 Casal Garcia White (Vinho Verde)

description: From the granite soil of the northern area of Vinho Verde, this rich, structured and dense bottling is far from the conventional view of Vinho Verde. It is a powerful, ripe, apricot and peach flavored wine that is strongly mineral and concentrated. Drink now, but the wine will improve for several years.
title: Luis Seabra 2013 Granito Cru Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Tight, taut, crisp and mineral in character, this is the epitome of a lemon-flavored wine. It is totally fresh, bright and full of green fruits and a tangy character. One in a series of single variety wines from Vilacetinho.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2012 Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: This is light—the Ten in the name refers to its alcohol level—dry, crisp and fragrantly fresh. It is citrus dominant and deliciously refreshing—a wine that livens up the palate.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2011 Aphros Ten Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: From the northern part of Vinho Verde, this wine is produced from old vines that have been trained on traditional high trellises. It is full of citrus, ripe lemon and lime along with a crisp mineral texture. Its acidity is both tense and refreshing, allowing the wine a chance to age. Drink from 2018.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Nostalgia Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a ripe and creamy wine, with a smooth texture that is finely cut by peach and lemon curd flavors. Coming from the classic Alvarinho region in the north of Vinho Verde, next to Spain, this is a ripe, full wine that can be enjoyed now.
title: Quinta de Paços 2014 Casa do Capitão-mor Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: There is a slight pepper character in this wine with its ripe fruits and fresh acidity. The result is a balanced wine that is not just about fruitiness but also full of character and with some complexity. The wine can be drunk now, although it will be better from the end of 2016.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2015 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A sugar water style of Vinho Verde, all sweetness and acidity. It is fresh and clean, very crisp and green.
title: Vidigal 2013 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is fresh, fruity and crisp. It has delicious, young citrus flavors that are bursting with energy and life. Aromatic and textured, with mineral hints, this is a delicious, refreshing wine to drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Vines over 20 years old are seen as old vines for this wine. A ripe wine, it is full of tropical fruits, with a dense texture and intense green-fruit acidity. Mineral with balanced fruit, it will be ready to drink from mid-2017.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Vinhas Velhas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a typically light, fruity and off dry Vinho Verde. It has an attractive, refreshing prickle on the tongue followed by crisp apples and citrus flavors. Clean, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Dão Sul 2013 Xadrez White (Vinho Verde)

description: A crisp wine, fruity and with a good sense of acidity and citrus fruits. Being made from Alvarinho, it also has a richer background to give this wine great intensity despite its light weight. It is the sort of Alvarinho that needs to age, so drink ideally from early 2018.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 QM Lagar Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly fizzy, this young fruity wine is an easygoing Vinho Verde. It is just off dry, giving a soft character to the lively fruit, citrus and floral wine. It is ready to drink.
title: Santos & Seixo NV Rotas de Portugal Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a rich style of Vinho Verde, smooth and ripe. Apricots and marmalade oranges dominate the flavor profile, while the citrus character pushes through strongly at the end. It's very fresh and could probably age until mid-2015.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Colheita Seleccionada Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: Ripe while still so fresh, this is a tangy, citrus-flavored wine. It has a rich creamy character that fills the mouth with a fine array of fruits, yellow fruits and pink grapefruit. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2014 Primeiras Vinhas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Still young, this wine brings out the ripe and creamy side of Alvarinho. Its citrus character is prominent along with a strong mineral texture. Weight from the skin contact during fermentation has produced a dense structure. Keep this wine until 2015.
designation: Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Nostalgia
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Nostalgia Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This caramel-flavored wine has a light red fruit character. It is off dry and needs to be severely chilled.
title: Calamares 2014 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright pink in color, a caramel flavor resting on taut strawberries and a fresh berry character. There is a touch of apple to go with the light, bright style. Drink this year.
title: Casa do Valle 2009 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: One of the most popular Vinho Verdes, this is in a light, medium-sweet style. Very fresh and crisp, with some attractive citrus acidity, and ready to drink now. Screwcap.
title: Aveleda 2012 Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is a slight prickle that gives a surprise lift to this dry wine. Along with that is crisp fruit (lemon and apple flavors) and a refreshing amount of acidity. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2016 Dom Diogo Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: This blend of Trajadura and Alvarinho comes from the far north of the Vinho Verde region. The wine is cool and perfumed with apricot as well as creamed pear flavors. Drink the wine now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 Blue White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, bright and fruity this is an easy-to-drink off-dry wine for the summer. It is clean and crisp, apples and pears set off by floral aromas. Drink now.
title: Vinihold 2016 Caiua a Noite White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Loureiro, Arinto and Avesso, this light and fruity wine has an edge of prickle along with great acidity and citrus flavors. It is a great summer food wine. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines NV Cascas White (Vinho Verde)

description: Named after the pheasant (Faisão), the wine is crisp enough to be refreshing. It is medium sweet and lightly textured with orange zest. Drink now.
title: Enoport 2016 Faisão White (Vinho Verde)

description: From old Alvarinho vines, this wine was fermented in wood to round it out and give extra richness. The wine certainly is full-bodied, intensely fruity, packed with apricot as well as citrus flavors. The toast element is as much a presence as a taste, giving the wine the possibility of aging. It's too fresh now; drink from 2016.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Nostalgia 10 Barricas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This medium-sweet rosé is a familiar style of local Portuguese wine. Fruity with raspberry flavor, it gives a slight a prickle on the tongue and has lively acidity. Drink now.
title: Caves Campelo 2015 Campelo Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Avesso is the hallmark white grape from the south of the Vinho Verde region. This wine is deliciously crisp, with a touch of oak to add spice. It is full of ripe apples, with an aftertaste that brims with acidity.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Avesso Superior Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine, with impressive intensity for a red Vinho Verde, is ripe in attractive red berry flavors alongside crisp acidity. It is fruity, soft and ready to drink. Wines called Pardusco were exported from Portugal to England in the 14th century.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2013 Pardusco Red (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of four Vinho Verde grapes, this dry wine is crisp and spicy, with an herbal character. It has bright fruitiness, plenty of acidity and a crisp, tight, mineral aftertaste.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Named after a local landmark, this is rich for a Vinho Verde, a soft blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura that brings out white fruits as well as a more citrus character. It's very aromatic, fruity and worth keeping a few months.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2012 Torre de Menagem White (Vinho Verde)

description: A dry Vinho Verde that has crisp citrus as well as riper yellow fruits. A blend of Alvarinho with Trajadura, it comes from the north of Vinho Verde. It's perfumed, fresh and crisp while showing a full texture. Drink starting in late 2014.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2013 Torre de Menagem Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced from oldest vines of the estate (Primeiras Vinhas), this is a rich and concentrated wine. Yellow fruits show strongly, giving ripe, intense flavors that are both refreshing and dense. It's full of fruit as well as delicious final acidity. Drink now.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2013 Primeiras Vinhas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Light and fruity, this is a crisply citrus wine, soft and fresh. Grapefruit and apricots are both there, showing the crisp and the rich side to this immediately attractive wine.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2013 Lagar Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Almonds and ripe yellow fruits combine in this surprisingly warm Vinho Verde. It has weight and richness as well as an immediately attractive fruity style. Easy to drink now, with a touch of caramel at the end.
title: Ideal Drinks 2013 Eminência Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, crisp and fruity, this is a bright, citrus driven wine. It is dry, full of ripe apricot and grapefruit flavors. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Maria Bonita Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: A bright, tight and crisp wine that is is mineral, tangy and refreshing to drink. It hints at the ripe fruits that will develope through 2017.
title: Quinta de Santiago 2015 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Perfect apéritif Vinho Verde, light as a feather, attractively laced with citrus and peach flavors. It has a light prickle on the tongue, with a soft aftertaste.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2010 Salsus Colheita White (Vinho Verde)

description: From the south of Vinho Verde, close to the Douro, this is a lively and fresh wine, bright with acidity and lifted by its prickle on the tongue. It is dry, although a soft touch of baked apple gives a gentle, fruity aftertaste.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2014 Conde Vilar Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Alvarinho from the north of the Vinho Verde gives a ripe, creamy textured wine that also has a cool feel to it. It is juicy, with a fine floral character as well as ripe lemon and apple flavors. Drink this wine now.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Toucas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A bright, lemon flavored wine with tight acidity and an attractive mineral texture. It is floral, zesty and very ready to drink.
title: Vila Nova 2015 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Fruity and light, this is a Vinho Verde that is on the light, sweet side. It has ample acidity to go with the sherbet flavor. This ready to drink wine would be a good apéritif.
title: Vercoope 2012 Pavão Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Ripe Alvarinho from its home turf in the Minho Valley, this wine is immediately attractive while also having a more serious intent. There is a crisp apple edge to this textured wine along with a creamy character that makes it both smooth and intense. Drink this from early 2018.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 QM Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Floral, aromatic and light in texture, this has attractive prickle on the palate, with sweetness on the finish. A fine summer quaffer.
title: Lagosta 2011 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Made using skin contact to give extra intensity to the fruit flavor and structure, this is a ripe and full wine. It has creamed apple and pineapple flavors, with tangy acidity that bursts like berries on the palate. Drink this impressive wine from late 2016.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2014 Contacto Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a bright, fruity, off-dry wine that is crisp and clean. It has a fine light touch of acidity and white fruits. Aromatic and attractively perfumed, it is ready now.
title: Global Wines 2015 Xadrez White (Vinho Verde)

description: From selected grapes, this partially wood-aged wine is a rich take on Vinho Verde. It has weight and a fine creamy texture. The acidity and the orange zest flavors are filled out with ripe apples and green plums with just a hint of toast. Drink from late 2017.
title: Casa do Valle 2016 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: A superior Vinho Verde, elegant and full-bodied. The creamy texture is partnered with ripe apricot and pear fruits, a touch of green plum and a feeling of opulence along with the acidity. Drink now, or age a year.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Toucas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: From a series of single variety wines from Vilacetinho, this Loureiro shows the aromatic character that has made this an increasingly popular variety for local producers. It has a delicate perfume, great acidity, and crispness and a very direct apple quality that is deliciously cool.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2012 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly prickly on the tongue, this is a refreshing, almost dry wine. It is bright, lively and fruity with citrus and crisp apple flavors. The wine is light and bright with plenty of acidity at the end.
title: Aveleda 2015 Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)

description: Avesso, a rare varietal in the Vinho Verde region, has produced a smooth and ripe wine. It has flavors of green olive, pear and a tight citrus character. There's fine depth of flavor on this delicious wine.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2011 Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: Azal is one of most widely planted vines in Vinho Verde. It gives an attractive wine, with high acidity. This wine is crisp with lemon and with a tangy aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Dom Diogo Colheita Seleccionada Azal (Vinho Verde)

description: With its light prickle on the tongue and mineral texture, this is a crisp, dry wine. It is floral with pineapple and bright apple flavors. The acidity and the tangy orange zest all add to the freshness of the wine. Drink now.
title: Vila Nova 2015 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is classic, ripe and creamy Alvarinho. It has a mineral edge to keep the boisterous yellow fruits and ripe perfumed flavors in order. The wine is ready to drink, full of fruit and freshness.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A bright crisp wine with attractive acidity and citrus flavors. Off dry, packed with fruit and with a gentle mousse, it is ready to drink.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of two of Vinho Verde's richer grapes results in this concentrated full-bodied wine. It is smooth and rich with fruit flavors ranging from citrus to apricot. The acidity is cushioned by the ripe texture. Drink this serious from late 2017.
title: Quinta da Raza 2016 Avesso-Alvarinho Colheita Seleccionada White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a sweet and soft rosé. It has perfumed red-berry fruits that are given a lift by the acidity. The finish is fresh while sweet.
title: Lago Cerqueira 2014 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is clean, fresh and fruity. It is medium sweet, with a bright candy-pink color and light acidity. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2014 Portal da Calçada Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: With its fresh prickle on the tongue and off-dry character, this is an easy, lemon-candy flavored wine that is best drunk young and well chilled. The finish is fresh and crisp.
title: Quinta de Lourosa 2014 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This medium-sweet sparkling wine is soft and rounded. It has an attractive mousse, with some fresh acidity to give the sweetness a lift. The aftertaste is clean and fruity.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Medium Dry Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a sweet sparkling wine that's based around the red grapes of Vinho Verde. It is light and fruity, surrounded by a ripe strawberry flavor and attractive acidity. Drink now.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Rosé Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: While this wine has eye-watering acidity, it also has a sweet backdrop of fruit candies and lemon tang. It is ready to drink.
title: Lago Cerqueira 2014 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fruity, crisp wine with an attractive balance between acidity and sweetness. Ripe strawberries give the fruit flavor while the acidity at the light prickle on the palate add a crisper aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Viniverde 2015 Alto Lima Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced from the Espadeiro, a grape widely used in red Vinho Verde, this is a crisp wine with just a touch of candied sweetness. Strawberry fruit is given a blast of acidity. It is ready to drink.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2015 Espadeiro Colheita Seleccionada Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Green apple notes give way to grapefruit and melon, but tart lime and green apple flavors power this wine.
title: Quinta da Aveleda 2001 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: An elegant Alvarinho from the north of the Vinho Verde region. It has some wood aging, rounding out the acidity of the fruit and introducing a spiced orange and lime character, full-bodied and ripe. It could age until 2015, but is ready to drink.
title: Quinta de Santiago 2012 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a ripe, creamy wine—a fine example of the richness Alvarinho can attain. It has fine fruitiness, citrus, ripe apple and pear flavors balanced by a mineral texture and acidity. Drink this fine wine from 2018.
title: Aveleda 2016 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is on the sweet side of crisp, with ripe strawberry and plenty of acidity. It is a wine to chill, with its bright aftertaste and slight prickle on the tongue. Drink now.
title: Enoport 2016 Mapreco Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Half-and-half Alvarinho and Trajadura, the wine is dry, crisp and with just a touch of fizz. Grapefruit and lemon flavors mingle with softer apples to give a bright and lively wine that is just made for summer food. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Lixa 2016 Aromas das Castas Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Fresh and lightly sparkling, this is a crisp, citrus-driven wine. Its acidity is just right, fruity while well integrated. Some sweetness at the end makes it fine for apéritif drinking.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Soft, fruity and off dry, this is a typically fresh and light-hearted Vinho Verde. Attractive apple and lemon flavors shine through the lightly prickly texture. Drink immediately.
title: Caves Aliança 2013 Aliança White (Vinho Verde)

description: This medium-sweet, fruity wine is both light and crisp. Attractive acidity contrasts with the sparkling texture and the sugared citrus. It's very ready to drink.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Vilacentinho White (Vinho Verde)

description: A wood-fermented and -aged wine, this tones down the fruity freshness of Alvarinho and instead brings out a smooth, toasty and ripe character. Rich apricot and pineapple flavors and acidity are enveloped by notes of toast and spice. This impressive wine is still developing, so drink from the end of 2016.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2013 Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: In a richer style of Vinho Verde but nevertheless retaining plenty of cool, fresh characters. The wine has vivid grapefruit, lime and green apple flavors, rounded out attractively.
title: Casca Wines 2009 Monte Cascas Colheita White (Vinho Verde)

description: If any producer is going to make sense of Vinhão in red Vinho Verde, it's biodynamic producer Casal do Paço Padreiro. This has some richness as well as the typical cool-climate acidity, with a touch of spice and a balanced, smooth finish. Drink within the year.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2011 Aphros Vinhão (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a bone-dry, piercingly fresh wine. It has tense acidity and a mineral texture that would make it delicious as an accompaniment to seafood. The wine is crisp, refreshing and bright.
title: Dão Sul 2011 Quinta de Lourosa White (Vinho Verde)

description: Here's a caramel and red fruit-flavored wine that is soft and round. It is light and bright, with a light prickle on the tongue as well as a tangy, orange peel texture. Screwcap.
title: Vera 2012 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, fresh and sweet, here is an attractive, red fruit-flavored wine. It has the typical Vinho Verde prickle, along with balanced acidity that gives a crisp aftertaste.
title: Vercoope 2012 Pavão Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a finely made wine, fresh and crisp. It is dry but with a soft texture that turns it into a wine that's both good with food and as an apéritif. The aftertaste is crisp and still fruity.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2016 Portugal Ramos Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A sweet, soft, clean wine, anonymous almost. Yes, there is freshness, lightness, but all the time the awkward, unbalancing sweetness pulls it down. Drink very chilled.
title: Lagosta 2008 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright and fresh, a great mouthful of lemongrass spices, lime and tight, young flavors of grapefruit. The acidity suffuses the wine, lifting it, giving the fruit a vivid character. There is a clean, mineral aftertaste.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2007 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This crisp, lightly sparkling, off-dry Vinho Verde offers attractive acidity and bright citrus flavors, with hints of apple and green plum. Light and fresh, it's ready to drink now.
title: José Maria da Fonseca 2013 Twin Vines White (Vinho Verde)

description: Just off dry, this is a bright and crisp wine that bounces round the palate. It is summer apéritif time with this vivid, pink grapefruit-flavored wine.
title: Aveleda 2009 Fonte White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is an attractive wine that is crisp while also having a soft background texture. It is fruity, perfumed and balanced. Drink now.
title: Campelo 2014 Tres Castas White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a grapefruit- and apple-flavored wine with a lively prickle on the palate. Bright and dry, this is sharpened by a citrus flavor and acidity. Ready to drink.
title: Solar de Pinheiro 2011 Paço de São Lourenço White (Vinho Verde)

description: With a few months aging, the baby freshness of this wine has turned into ripe fruit with fresh apricot as well as citrus flavors. It's a bright wine, of course, full of lively acidity while having this extra layer of richness that comes from ripe Alvarinho. Drink now.
title: Dom Ponciano 2014 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A rich wood-aged wine, this is dense and creamy. With acidity and toast, ripe apples as well as spice, the wine is made to age. Coming from the Alvarinho heartland of Melgaço on Portugal's northern border, the wine has minerality and great intensity. It will be good until at least 2020.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2015 Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Alvarinho is best from the far north of Vinho Verde, which is the source for this wine. It gives a full, rich, very ripe wine that's rounded and packed with yellow fruits and a tight mineral and lemon juice character. The wine also has youth on its side and could age for several more years. Drink from 2014.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2012 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a shade off-dry, with ample crispness, a bright, prickly lightness and delicate texture. It's a great apéritif style, with its soft edge and easygoing freshness, that's ready to drink now.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2012 Vilacetinho White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura from vineyards in the far north of the Vinho Verde region. The wine is rich, aromatic, creamy. It has the right prickle in the mouth, with a final lemon peel character.
title: Provam 2010 Varanda do Conde White (Vinho Verde)

description: Young and fresh with an attractive prickle on the tongue, this medium-sweet Vinho Verde is well cut with acidity. Accented with apple and citrus, it is bright and ready to drink. Screwcap.
title: FVine 2013 White (Vinho Verde)

description: The family vineyards of consultant Anselmo Mendes are in the north of the Vinho Verde region the home of Alvarinho, so it's no surprise that this wine is a great interpetation of the grape. It is almost luscious in its intensity and richness. Orange, ripe apple and intense citrus flavors are encased in a generous, full-bodied wine. Drink now, although this wine will be even better from 2017.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2015 Muros Antigos Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: With the lightest, freshest tingle on the tongue, this is an off-dry wine that is crisp and fresh, combining citrus with sweetness. It is light-bodied, bright and ready to drink.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Lima 2014 Encostas do Lima White (Vinho Verde)

description: A dry Vinho Verde with a light sparkle that give it a fine lift. With intense citrus and a sliced apple freshness, the wine is refreshing and ready to drink.
title: Obrigado 2015 Vera White (Vinho Verde)

description: Vines in the southern Amarante region of Vinho Verde give this wine its ripe melon and apple flavors. It is tangy, bright with ripe fruit and with a lightly mineral texture. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2015 Portal da Calçada Reserva White (Vinho Verde)

description: A ripe blend of fresh apple and lemon fruits give this wine is crisp, dry character. It is packed with acidity, orange and lemon zest and has a lively aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: One of the most familiar Vinho Verde brands in Portugal, this wine is medium sweet with a light prickle on the tongue. It is fruity with creamed apple and citrus along with a touch of honey. The wine is crisp and clean, delicious to drink as an apéritif.
title: Borges NV Gatão White (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced from a single parcel in the family vineyard, this wine shows concentration and density. It has a tense structure that is softened by wood aging, resulting in a fine balance between the natural fresh acidity of the fruit and a smooth character. Abundant in ripe yellow and citrus fruits, this is ready to drink now.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2012 Parcella Unica Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: The Avesso grape is grown mainly in the south of Vinho Verde, in the warmer area nearer the Douro. Green plums and white peach flavors give this a ripe character while the citric edge adds the freshness. Drink this attractive wine now.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2015 Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine, with its late release and maturity is aiming to show that Alvarinho can age. The verdict: Sometimes, but not this time. The wine is definitely old with a strong oxidative character and no sign of any fruit.
title: Howard's Folly 2012 Sonhador Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Floral and aromatic, this has a hint of prickle to go with the citrus, green apple and white peach flavors. There is an attractive mineral character—the wine dancing and fragrant.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2011 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A barrel-aged Alvarinho, but one that is so delicately toasty that the fruit is what this ripe generous wine is all about. It is rich with citrus and pear flavors, zesty and tangy while also having room for a round ripe aftertaste. This is an impressive wine, ready to drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Reserva Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A full-bodied wine, ripely fruity while preserving the natural, cool freshness of a Vinho Verde. It is richly endowed with apple and pear flavors, a touch of yellow fruit and a just a hint of spice. One in a series of single variety wines from Vilacetinho.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2012 Avesso (Vinho Verde)

description: Sweet, frothy and very pink, this is a strawberry-jelly rosé, light and fruity. The touch of acidity at the end is very welcome.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2013 Conde Villar Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Some wood aging has rounded out this fruity wine. But it has not radically changed its inherent fresh, crisp character. It shows apples, lemon and lime juice and just a touch of spice from wood. The wine is ready to drink but will be best if left until 2015.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2011 Daphne Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: An easy, fresh, slightly sparkling wine with pleasant, soft, lightly sweet fruit flavors. It is clean, a great apéritif for a summer's day.
title: Caves Aliança 2006 White (Vinho Verde)

description: While it's fresh and creamy, as any Vinho Verde should be, there's something extra to this smooth wine. The tangy acidity is balanced by melon and apple flavors to give the wine some richness. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Hera Grande Escolha Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: This is the entry-level wine from this Alvarinho specialist. A blend with Trajadura, it is crisp, light and bright. Tangy orange and lemon zest flavors give the wine its tight, lively acidity and refreshing aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Provam 2015 Varanda do Conde White (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright, lively and fruity, this is a delicious, crisp, dry Vinho Verde from the north of the region, close to Spain. It has citrus notes, a bright texture, lively acidity and a touch of spritz.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2012 Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: From the homeland of Alvarinho in the Monção region in the north of Vinho Verde, the wine is rich and mineral with touches of wood fermentation adding spice. It is textured, full of juicy fruit at the end. Drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: With vines in the south of the Vinho Verde region, the estate has wines with a warm, ripe character. This example shows a richer side of Vinho Verde while preserving the natural crisp edge. Tropical fruits are balanced with a citrus aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2015 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Very fruity, this is a dry wine, with green fruits, citrus and a tangy character. It is light, bright and fresh, very ready to drink.
title: Casca Wines 2012 Monte Cascas Colheita White (Vinho Verde)

description: A light and fruity style of Vinho Verde, its acidity balanced with pear and white-currant notes. Lemon flavors cut through, adding brightness.
title: Vercoope 2011 Terras de Felgueiras White (Vinho Verde)

description: High-acid red wine is not for everyone, but this one—dry, stalky and light—is a genuine example of a wine that has always had a following in northern Portugal, great for pairing with fresh sardines. Think that way, and it's more than just a curiosity.
title: Caves Campelo 2015 Campelo Tinto Red (Vinho Verde)

description: Soft, light and fruity, this wine is ready for a warm day. Apple flavors and clean acidity balance its soft sweetness, making it ready to drink now. Intriguingly, its label resembles that of a much more familiar brand of Vinho Verde.
title: Caves Campelo 2015 Casal da Seara White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is something of the essential crispness and green fruit character of a Vinho Verde. But the wine also has some richness, weight, and a creamy texture. Very aromatic, this is a wine to drink and also age a few months.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Maria Papoila Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This well-balanced wine is rich, just off dry and with a mineral texture. Plenty of freshness with a crisp aftertaste balances the softer side of the wine. It's for immediate drinking.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Hera White (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright, fruity and fresh, this familiar Vinho Verde brand does exactly what it's meant to do: provide a refreshing, light glass of wine. Apples and citrus easily carry the lightly sweet flavors and blend with an orange zest texture. Drink immediately.
title: Aveleda 2013 Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: A sweet wine that has a candy shop confected taste. It does have acidity along with a touch of citrus although the sherbet aftertaste is off-putting.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Ela Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Vividly pink in color, this is a light and sweet wine. There is a sugary aftertaste followed by fresh, crisp acidity.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Ela Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly spritzy, this tastes of crisp apple and finishes just off-dry. It's deliciously refreshing, bright and tangy. Drink now.
title: Caves Campelo 2015 Miranda White (Vinho Verde)

description: With its typical prickle on the tongue, this is a medium sweet wine. It's clean, crisp and citrusy, with sliced apple and orange zest flavors. Drink now.
title: Caves Campelo 2015 Campelo White (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp and herbaceous, this is a green-fruited wine that's light on the palate, offering delightful refreshing acidity. This is very fruity and ready to drink.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2011 Clemens Reserva White (Vinho Verde)

description: The light prickle adds to the natural freshness of this lemon-sherbet-flavored wine. Very crisp and light in the mouth, this dances on the palate with just a touch of sweetness.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2011 Salsus White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura, this combines a creamy texture with bright green fruit acidity. There is weight as well as freshness, the aftertaste rich while also crisp.
title: Provam 2009 Varanda do Conde White (Vinho Verde)

description: Now in a smart clear blue bottle, this is Aveleda's estate wine. It is always a classic, with just some extra weight to give it distinction. The flavors are apple, brightened with lime, finishing with vibrant acidity.
title: Aveleda 2009 Quinta da Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine has plenty of crisp fruit along with touches of smokiness and a riper, yellow fruit character. It's a rich wine, young and fresh and with the potential to age. Drink now, although it will be better from 2017.
designation: Castas de Monção Reserva Bruto Natural
title: Adega de Monção 2011 Castas de Monção Reserva Bruto Natural Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: This manages to be rounded and crisp at the same time, giving an intense citrus flavor and a soft texture, with just a touch of honey on the finish.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2011 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: With a typical touch of fizz, this wine is fruity, light and bright. It is dry, very fresh, full of apples and lime juice. Refreshing and ready to drink.
title: Quinta do Cruzeiro 2012 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Azal is a comparatively rare grape to be vinified on its own, so this example is something of a curiosity. It has plenty of acidity and is a refreshing, appley wine suited for summertime drinking, very chilled.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Colheita Seleccionada Azal (Vinho Verde)

description: From the northern Portuguese heartland of Alvarinho, this beautifully ripe and rich wine is packed with intense perfumes of white peach and green apple. Fresh fruit and crisp acidity give a lively, tangy aftertaste. Drink from late 2015.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 QM Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Red sparkling wine is always an acquired taste, especially when it is a tannic, tart version like this. But this is as fine as a red sparkling Vinho Verde can be. Pair it with sardines.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro NV Aphros  Super-Reserva Bruto Vinhão (Vinho Verde)

description: Fresh and crisp, classic dry Vinho Verde, a blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura, with citrus flavors and a tight texture. Lively and fresh.
title: Borges 2009 AT White (Vinho Verde)

description: A medium-dry Vinho Verde, this is light and fresh without being quite crisp enough. Well chilled, though, it makes a lively and fresh apéritif.
title: Caves Aliança 2009 Aliança White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura, a lively, fruity wine that has just a hint of a prickle on the tongue. It has apple and grapefruit flavors that are fresh and deliciously crisp. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 Torre de Menagem Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: A ripe, tropical fruit flavored wine that is both fresh and rich. While produced in an area of Vinho Verde that is predominately dedicated to the Alvarinho grape, this dry wine is a refreshing, bright blend of many of the local varieties. It is juicy, crisp and ready to drink.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2015 Muros Antigos Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This fresh wine shows fruit tones balanced by a light mineral note. It is bright with acidity and grapefruit flavors alongside a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Campelo 2014 Miranda White (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced in the Lima Valley, in the heart of the Vinho Verde region, this is fruity and crisp. It is medium sweet in character, the sweetness balanced by the refreshing acidity and citrus flavors. Drink now.
title: Viniverde 2015 Alto Lima White (Vinho Verde)

description: One of the better examples in this category, this is crisp and clean. It has a hint of tannin and a green edge from the only just-ripe grapes. The strawberry flavor at the end does bring an attractive aftertaste.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: With the classic tongue-tickle of young Vinho Verde, this fresh, crisp and off-dry wine is immediately drinkable. It has ripe orange and sweet citrus fruitiness, and plenty of acidity.
title: Obrigado 2014 Vera Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Aromas of white flowers lead into crisp lemon and grapefruit flavors. This has a fresh tang from the light prickle on the tongue, along with ripe peach and apple skin flavors. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Lixa 2014 Colheita White (Vinho Verde)

description: This just off-dry rosé is crisp, packed with strawberry fruits and balanced in acidity. Made from the Padeiro grape, one of the many Vinho Verde red grapes, it is an attractive wine, finishing with a bright, light aftertaste.
title: Quinta da Raza 2014 Dom Diogo Colheita Seleccionada Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Here's a bright, slightly sparkling wine, with fresh acidity and an off-dry, fruity character. It has attractive lemon-lime flavors and a salty, mineral aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2014 White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is the faintest prickle on this dry, ripe and creamy wine. It has ripe acidity with crisp apple and green plum fruits. There is just the edge of minerality to give this wine texture. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Dom Diogo Colheita Seleccionada Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: From the Moncão region, heartland of Alvarinho, at the north of Vinho Verde, this is a delicious wine, its green flavors bursting out of the glass. It is fresh, very crisp, edged with yeastiness but then boosted by its tight acidity.
title: Aveleda 2007 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: After Verdelho, Loureiro is the other fine Vinho Verde grape. Here it gives crisp lemon acidity that goes with a bright fruitiness and a tight, mineral texture that comes from the granite soil. Drink this fresh wine now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: A wood-aged red Vinho Verde brings out some richness in the Vinhão grape. With its already-red juice, the wine has surprising weight and ripeness with black currant fruit to the fore. Drink now.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2012 Aphros Tinto Vinhão (Vinho Verde)

description: The perfect summer apéritif, this light, fresh, crisp wine tastes just drier than previous vintages, allowing the apple and lemon fruits to shine even more. It has a tight, taut aftertaste, leaving the mouth clean and refreshed. Screwcap.
title: José Maria da Fonseca 2008 Twin Vines White (Vinho Verde)

description: Delicious citrus and grape juice aromas, with a vivid, lively dry style that explodes with white fruit and lime flavors. The wine is a great apéritif, or with shellfish.
title: Caves da Cerca 2008 Famega White White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a deliciously fresh, yet also rounded and rich wine. Creamed apples and soft pears go with a lime juice crispness, resulting in a wine that is ripe, fruity and delicately acidic. Drink now.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2012 Muros Antigos White (Vinho Verde)

description: This has attractive apple and citrus fruits,with a crisp structure and some sweetness on the finish.
title: Cavipor 2011 Vinhas Altas White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a wine that shows a more serious side to Vinho Verde. Bone dry, with a crisp and creamy texture, it has citrus, pineapple and red apple flavors. It could even age a few months, but is so drinkable now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2013 Dom Diogo Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly sparkling, this is a crisp, almost dry wine that offers fresh sliced apples and citrus flavors. Made from the Louriero grape which is widely planted in the Lima valley, this is a fruity sip for the summer.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Lima 2014 Ponte Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a sweet, lightly sparkling wine. It has crisp apple as well as citrus flavors to contrast with the sweetness. Drink now.
title: Viniverde 2015 Estreia White (Vinho Verde)

description: Soft and candied, this is a ripe wine that has sweet strawberry-fruit flavors. It is ready to drink.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2015 Lago Cerqueira Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This popular brand's pink version is off dry, lightly fizzy and fruity. It has a strawberry-sherbet character that is attractive and great for summer drinking.
title: Aveleda 2015 Casal Garcia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: There is an attractive light sparkle to this off-dry rosé. It has strawberry fruit and a touch of acidity that balances the candied softness. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Dom Diogo Padeiro Colheita Seleccionada Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A light, sweet wine that has a faint prickle and candied-strawberry flavors. It is ready to drink.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2015 Flamingo Escolha Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A ripe wine, with white fruits and a touch of spice. The crisp minerality of Vinho Verde is all there, with a satisfyingly textured aftertaste.
title: Solar de Pinheiro 2009 White (Vinho Verde)

description: The creamy, ripe character of Alvarinho is pronounced in this rich wine. Ripe citrus and juicy apricot fruit give a smooth, rounded character that is lightly crispened by its final tangy acidity. Drink from 2017.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Toucas Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Fruity and intense, this is a very fine Vinho Verde from the northern vineyards of the region. It is full, packed with pear, lemon meringue and grapefruit flavors, feeling rich as well as crisp. A wine like this can age, so drink until 2017.
title: Anselmo Mendes 2012 Muros Antigos Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly sweet, this is a refreshing, fruity wine. It's a great apéritif for the summer with its ripe lemon and grapefruit that are given a push by the softer green plum  fruits. Drink now.
title: Aveleda 2013 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fruity style of Vinho Verde that also brings out the crispest citrus and pink grapefruit flavors. The wine, with its light spritz, is fresh, full of acidity and just off dry. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Raza 2013 Raza White (Vinho Verde)

description: This sweet rosé is light and crisply fruity. Strawberry flavors make it an immediately refreshing and enjoyable apéritif wine.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Escolha Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Features citrus-flower and lime aromas. Lightweight, and with a slight spritz, this is a correct and refreshing Vinho Verde, with tart lime and quartz-mineral elements. A blend of 95% Alvarinho and 5% Trajadura.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 1998 Torre de Menagem White (Vinho Verde)

description: The essence of jalapeños may be found in this new-wave Sauvignon Blanc. Unfortunately, that’s pretty much all there is. It’s a bit simple and even seems a bit hollow or overcropped, with a short finish.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 1998 QM Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fun, candy-pink colored wine that is off dry, with a light effervescent prickle on the tongue. It has a tangy character that brings out intense acidity, with crisp red-currant and raspberry flavors. Drink now.
title: Obrigado 2014 Vera Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a fruity wine that has fresh, lemony crispness to balance the sweet-fruit palate. Bright and clean, it is ready to drink now.
title: Quinta da Lixa 2014 Anjos White (Vinho Verde)

description: While the wine is clean, it tastes yeasty and heavy despite its low alcohol. There is strawberry fruitiness and final acidity, although the sweetness remains intrusive.
title: Aveleda 2014 Casal Garcia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Here is a lightly sweet, fresh wine that has crisp red-currant and raspberry flavors. It's bright, clean and ready to drink now.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2014 Pluma Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A sweet and fizzy wine, this is also tight with acidity and textured with tannins. It has a mineral edge along with the intense crispness that is really too much.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2015 Pluma Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a sweet, confected wine. It has sugary red fruits and just enough acidity. Made from the Vinhão grape, it is soft and ready to drink.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2015 Portal da Calçada Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright pink in color, this looks and tastes like candy. There is the lightest touch of acidity to at least bring some crispness to this sweet wine.
title: Viniverde 2015 Estreia Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A deliciously fresh and soft young wine, it is just off dry: really more light and crisp. Lemon and tight citrus flavors are lifted by a prickle on the tongue. This is a perfect summer drink.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 Blue White (Vinho Verde)

description: Fragrant and fruity, this very fresh wine has a strong mineral texture. The freshness gives way to a deeper, rich sense that brings out a more creamy character. It's ripe and rich at the end.
title: Casal Paço Padreiro 2013 Aphros Ten White (Vinho Verde)

description: Intense and crisp, it shows bright fruits and some weight as well. A touch of yellow fruits give the grapefruit a warmer character and good depth of flavor. It's a Vinho Verde for cooler days, ripe and ready for food.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Maria Papoila Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Perfumed and crisp, this is attractive and medium-sweet. It has fine acidity to balance the sweetness and a line of clean acidity that goes with the preserved lemon and tangy aftertaste.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Sparkling (Vinho Verde)

description: Soft and soapy, this is a simple wine without much character. It's a light, slightly sweet wine to be drunk this year. Screwcap.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is fresh, with plenty of acidity. It also has delicious raspberry fruits, the ripeness well integrated into the wine. For immediate drinking.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2013 Hera Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Here is a lightly sparkling, just off-dry Vinho Verde, the sort of wine that just goes down as an apéritif or, in Portugal, with sardines. It's a crisp, bright wine, a lemon curd flavor finishing the apple fruitiness.
title: Solar de Pinheiro 2013 Paço de São Lourenço Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is fairly typical, light, fruity lemon-driven Vinho Verde. It has a light spritz, and is exuberantly fresh with just a touch of ripeness and crisp, cool acidity. Perfect to drink this summer.
title: Caves Aliança 2012 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Produced from vines in the Lima Valley in northern Portugal, the home of the Loureiro grape, this light and fruity wine is immediately attractive, with its gentle citrus flavors and intense acidity. Drink this aromatic wine right now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Lima Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Fruity and medium dry, this is soft, with citrus hits to balance the sweetness. The wine is bright and light in the mouth, better as an apéritif than with food.
title: Quinta da Raza 2014 Dom Diogo Colheita Seleccionada Branco Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a juicy, ripe style of Vinho Verde that's soft, clean and refreshing. It's a summer-evening wine, light and bright. Screwcap.
title: Calamares 2012 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp lemon and green apple flavors shine through this lively, fruity wine. It has a cool character, tangy fruitiness and a touch of pepper. The wine is made to drink in its youth and is ready now.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Maria Papoila White (Vinho Verde)

description: A crisp, off-dry Vinho Verde with a good prickle on the tongue. Flavors of lemon and green apple are well balanced in this ready-to-drink summer wine. Screwcap.
title: Viniverde 2011 Estreia White (Vinho Verde)

description: The Loureiro grape, grown mainly in the Lima Valley in the center of Vinho Verde, produces a distinctly mineral style of wine. This wine has that character as well as some riper tropical fruit notes and pure citrus acidity. The combination is intensely fruity and very refreshing.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2013 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is off dry, fruity and refreshing. It has lively citrus acidity as well as sliced apple crispness. The wine has the lightest prickle on the tongue, leaving a bright aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2015 Tiroliro White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is dry and surprisingly rich for a Vinho Verde. It has pineapple and peach as well as the more familiar citrus and green fruit flavors. With lively acidity at the end, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2015 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is an off-dry wine, full of fruit and crisp acidity. It has a soft texture and touches of tropical fruit. The wine comes from vineyards in the south of Vinho Verde, close to the Douro.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2015 Vilacetinho White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a ripe, full wine, retaining Vinho Verde's classic taut acidity, but rounded out with sweet apple and lime flavors. It's food friendly and would make for a fine apéritif.
title: Casa do Valle 2011 White (Vinho Verde)

description: With a part of this wine fermented in wood, it is rich and toasty yet still fruity at this stage. The layers of spice go with the ripe, creamy fruit and the mineral, tight texture. All these elements suggest successful aging, so this will be best drunk from 2017.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Tight, taut, mineral-driven wine, lively with a light prickle on the tongue. This is very fresh, with citrus and grapefruit flavors. Delicious, bone-dry Vinho Verde.
title: Quinta de Santa Maria 2009 Quinta do Tamariz Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Full and round, this is a smooth and rich wine. It brings out the creamy side of Alvarinho, with stewed-pear and yellow fruit flavors. There is ample length and acidity at the end.
title: Vercoope 2012 Via Latina Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This dry Vinho Verde shows great crisp, green apple and grapefruit flavors, a deliciously fresh wine, with green edges and lively flavors. Great summer drink.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2006 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Smooth and rounded with light, perfumed sweetness, this is an easy and approachable wine. Its pear and kiwi flavors come together easily. Screwcap.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Barca 2011 Hera White (Vinho Verde)

description: With its roundness, this wine shows the character of the Loureiro grape. Giving a tweak to the softer element is a burst of fine acidity, a lime juice note and a fresh aftertaste.
title: Viniverde 2011 Estreia Grande Escolha Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: A floral, fruity and intensely perfumed wine, yeasty, with mature acidity and almond flavors underlining the green lime element. It is very dry, needing the extra year since harvest to round it out and give it richness as well as freshness.
title: Quinta do Ameal 2006 Loureiro (Vinho Verde)

description: Almost bubbly with a lively mousse, this is a tangy citrus and apple flavored wine that is unfortunately unbalanced with an artificial sweetness at the end.
title: Campelo 2014 White (Vinho Verde)

description: Made in a richer style, it is bone dry and with a creamy texture, apricot fruit flavors as well as the right, crisp acidity. The wine is fresh, fruity and, of course, needs to be drunk now.
title: LIV 2012 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a rich, fruity wine that has a delicious apple flavor cut by lemony acidity to give a line of freshness. The wine is dry, fruity and ready to drink.
title: Casa do Valle 2014 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is no ordinary Vinho Verde. With its rich Alvarinho flavors, it is a wine that can be aged. The mouthfeel is full in green plum and ripe apricot flavors, and textured by a great swathe of fresh, tangy citrus. It can be drunk now, although it will be better from 2016.
title: Provam 2012 Vinha Antiga Escolha Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A pioneer in rosé Vinho Verde, this producer makes a dry wine and one of the few rosés from the region that really make sense. It is balanced with crisp red fruits as well as tight acidity and a shot of lemon. Drink now.
title: Casa do Valle 2015 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of grapes from the north of the Vinho Verde region, this is tangy and crisp. It is bright and dry with attractive acidity and a lemon zest texture. Drink now.
title: Caves da Montanha 2014 Trinca Espinhas Alvarinho-Trajadura White (Vinho Verde)

description: While still light, this Vinho Verde has a creamy texture and a sense of richness. It blends two of the quality grapes of the region, Alvarinho and Loureiro. Together they make an aromatic, intense and tangy wine that is ready to drink.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Maria Papoila White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a pétillant off-dry wine. It has a soapy character that is lifted by citrus fruits, a crisp texture and lively acidity. Drink immediately.
title: Caves Aliança 2016 Aliança White (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright and fruity, this wine is citrusy while also suggesting ripe white-fruit flavors. It has a fine tang of lime zest that gives an underlying cool, green character to this attractive wine.
title: Quinta da Raza 2012 Dom Diogo Colheita Seleccionada Arinto (Vinho Verde)

description: A selection of the best parcels of Alvarinho, this is a wood fermented wine. It is round and soft with as much spice as fruit. The texture is full, lightly tangy as well as hinting at minerality. The aftertaste, with its rich toast, is generous and suggests the wine is ready to drink.
title: Provam 2014 Vinha Antiga Escolha Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Tight with shocking acidity, this wine confirms that red Vinho Verde can often be an acquired taste, perhaps best left to the local market back in Portugal.
title: Campelo 2014 Red (Vinho Verde)

description: Producer of one of the first rosé Vinho Verde, Casa do Valle continues to make one of the best. Full of delicious strawberry flavors with great acidity, deliciously fruity.
title: Casa do Valle 2010 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a rich impressively structured wine. It showcases the Alvarinho and brings out its fruit and flavors. The subtle wood aging has just enhanced the fruit. The wine is delicious and is now just ready to drink, although it will be better from early 2018.
title: Provam 2015 Vinha Antiga Escolha Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: A whole slew of adjectives beginning with the letter F are used by the producer to describe this wine. It is a gently sparkling, off-dry wine that has attractive acidity and a touch of citrus. It needs to be enjoyed now, well chilled for a warm day.
title: Aveleda 2014 F Vine White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is hardly a fashionable color for rosé, deep and almost like a light red wine. It tastes heavy, although the red fruits are cut by ample acidity. The finish is rich and ripe.
title: Casa do Valle 2014 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Lightly fizzy, this is a crisp, off-dry Vinho Verde. It has candied lemon flavors that are shot through with acidity, finishing bright and brisk. Drink now.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Toucas White (Vinho Verde)

description: From the northern Vinho Verde region of Monçao and Melgaço, this finely textured wine is young, although already delicious. Its texture brings out the minerality from the granite soil, giving the wine a zesty character. The fruit bursts out of the glass: delicious citrus and sliced apples and a great burst of acidity. Drink from late 2017.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2016 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: For a Vinho Verde, this is rich and full-bodied, showing delicious acidity, crisp apples and a touch of tropical fruit. There's the typical prickle on the tongue that brings out freshness, but in fact this wine could age for a year.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2012 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Bright, crisp raspberry flavors on a bone-dry wine. It is fresh and vibrant, a light touch of caramel and powerful acidity.
title: Campelo 2009 Rosé (Vinho Verde)

description: Very fruity, this is a refreshingly crisp lemon-flavored wine, bright and intensely tangy. It is a young Alvarinho and needs aging to bring out its ripe creamy, apple-and-pear character.
title: Provam 2014 Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a densely textured wine. It has a strong sense of minerality, while also having a fruitier side. Ripe acidity and a crisp citrus flavor are allied to the warmer apple and green-plum fruits. Drink this wine from late 2017.
title: Quinta da Raza 2016 Alvarinho-Trajadura Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is an impressively complex Vinho Verde, obviously made for food. With its tangy acidity and tense mineral texture, this blend of a range of the regional grapes is structured and with a delicious, refreshing aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Casa do Valle 2016 White (Vinho Verde)

description: This single vineyard Vinho Verde is complex and powerful. The texture is creamy, rich, with hints of pineapple as well as grapefruit. There is an edgy texture, balanced with the crispest final acidity.
title: Borges 2009 Quinta de Simaens White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is still young. Made from old vines and produced in a traditional way with indigenous yeasts, it is a wine that needs to age. It has a rich, concentrated fruitiness along with intense acidity and lemon flavor. The wine is ripe and full. Drink from 2017.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Nostalgia Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)

description: Dominated by Alvarinho, this is a spicy, fruity and tangy wine. It is still young with a tight mineral edge that will soften to bring out a more creamy character. The after-taste, with its fresh citrus, should remain. Drink from 2017.
title: Quinta da Raza 2015 Alvarinho-Trajadura Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
